alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:46AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, southeastern Crawford, Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 930 AM CST... At 846 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong showers along a line extending from 2 miles south of Arkoma to 4 miles west of Midland to 4 miles southeast of Heavener. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Charleston... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mulberry... Mansfield... Dyer... Hackett... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Branch... Midland... Moffett... Excelsior... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 22 and 26. Interstate 540 between mile markers 2 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
